notes:
- Peacock wandering in forest, looking for friends
- Crow asks to be friends, peacock rejects due to lack of beauty
- Fox also rejects peacock for same reason
- Peacock sees fox as handsome and wants to be friends
- Fox tricks and captures peacock, plans to eat it
- Peacock cries for help, crow hears and calls for friends to attack fox
- Peacock saved and grateful to crow, they become friends
- Lesson learned: everyone is important, don't judge by outside beauty, respect and be friends with good people
- Sharing of lesson and gratitude expressed
